Title: Bat Houses
Content: Whether large or small, bat houses help bats.
Ken Gioeli, a wildlife expert, poses with the bat house he built. It holds more than 15,000 bats.
Even though it’s small, this bat house still provides a safe place for bats to sleep.
Always remember that bats are wild animals, and never try to touch them.
